title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign 

Driving Licences) (Georgia) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic (recognition foreign driving licences) (georgia) order 2024

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: In this Order, “Regulations of 2006” means the Road Traffic (Licensing
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Regulations of 2006” means the Road Traffic (Licensing 

of Drivers) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006).
text_norm: 2 order regulation 2006 mean road traffic (licensing drivers) regulation 2006 (s.i no 537 2006)

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person to drive a
text_raw:
3. 

It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person to drive a 
mechanically propelled vehicle, not being a licence or permit issued to a person 
to enable that person to learn or provisionally to drive a vehicle, issued by the 
competent authority of Georgia, is recognised for the purpose of exchange of 
that licence or permit for a driving licence, in respect of any one or more of the 
categories in respect of which the licence or permit is held that corresponds to a 
category mentioned in the Table to Regulation 6 of the Regulations of 2006.
text_norm: 3 declared licence permit permitting person drive mechanically propelled vehicle licence permit issued person enable person learn provisionally drive vehicle issued competent authority georgia recognised purpose exchange licence permit driving licence respect one category respect licence permit held corresponds category mentioned table regulation 6 regulation 2006

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: 4. A licence or permit issued by the competent authority of Georgia in
text_raw:
4. A licence or permit issued by the competent authority of Georgia in 
respect of a category that corresponds to a category mentioned in column (1) of 
the Table to Regulation 27(3)(a) of the Regulations of 2006 may be exchanged 
for a driving licence in the category set out in column (2) of the Table opposite 
the mention in column (1).
text_norm: 4 licence permit issued competent authority georgia respect category corresponds category mentioned column (1) table regulation 27(3)(a) regulation 2006 may exchanged driving licence category set column (2) table opposite mention column (1)

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: 5. A licence or permit issued by the competent authority of Georgia to only
text_raw:
5. A licence or permit issued by the competent authority of Georgia to only 
drive a vehicle with automatic transmission (within the meaning of the 
Regulations of 2006) shall be exchanged for a driving licence to drive a vehicle 
with automatic transmission in the category concerned.
text_norm: 5 licence permit issued competent authority georgia drive vehicle automatic transmission (within meaning regulation 2006) shall exchanged driving licence drive vehicle automatic transmission category concerned

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: 6. This Order does not apply to a licence or permit issued by the competent
text_raw:
6. This Order does not apply to a licence or permit issued by the competent 
authority of Georgia in exchange for a licence or permit issued by a state other 
than the State, another Member State or a state in respect of which an order under 
section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961) applies. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [ ] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Transport, 

25 June, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [317]

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order recognises Georgian driving licences for driving licence exchange 
purposes under section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961. 

An Irish driving licence, granted in exchange under this Order for a licence or 
permit issued by the Georgian authorities to only drive a vehicle with automatic 
transmission, will permit a person to drive a vehicle with automatic transmission 
only.
